name: @dopt/filter-open-source
description: A package that filters the monorepo down to commits against open source packages

scripts.dev: echo "@dopt/filter-open-source does not require dev"; exit 0;
scripts.format: echo "@dopt/filter-open-source does not require formatting"; exit 0;
scripts.formatcheck: echo "@dopt/filter-open-source does not require formatcheck"; exit 0;
scripts.lint: echo "@dopt/filter-open-source does not require lint"; exit 0;
scripts.test: echo "@dopt/filter-open-source does not require test"; exit 0;
scripts.typecheck: echo "@dopt/filter-open-source does not require typecheck"; exit 0;
scripts.prepublishOnly: NODE_ENV=production pnpm -w exec turbo run build --filter="@dopt/filter-open-source"
